goals__remit: Through its members, the Open Cloud Foundation represents directly and indirectly more than 100 providers and more 1000 users.  Open Cloud FoundationWe strongly supports open source-based services, interoperability and reversibility as key operating principles, and therefore. We support this work and look forward to contributing to its implementation.
